value.title: Slicer Restatement in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at a small feature called slicer restatement in Power BI. This feature will help you to determine what was selected in a slicer. While this feature was added back in April 2018, we are betting that most folks don't know slicer restatement.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube --

value.title: STOP refreshing a single table at a time! (Power BI Desktop)
value.excerpt: Stop refreshing one table at a time! Also, don't wait for the entire data model to finish refreshing. Refresh multiple tables within Power BI Desktop. value.title: Power BI Financial Dashboard: Frequency x Reach x Yield = Revenue (The F.R.Y. approach)
value.excerpt: Let's do something unique for building a Financial Dashboard using Power BI. We would use the F.R.Y. approach (Frequency, Reach, Yield) to analyze our revenue numbers.  You can also use the F.R.Y. approach to analyze any other performance metric. Leave a comment and let me know how it went for you?
